sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {FormsModule, ReactiveFormsModule} from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-comment', imports: [ FormsModule, ReactiveFormsModule ], template: `

{{ title() }}

{{ editingPost() ? 'Edit Post' : 'Create New Post' }}

@if (editingPost()) { }

Latest Posts

@if (loading()) {

Loading posts...

} @if (!loading() && posts().length === 0) {

No posts yet. Create your first post above!

} @for (post of posts(); track post.id) {

{{ post.name }}

{{ post.comment }}

Post ID: {{ post.id }}
}
`, styles: ``, standalone: true }) export class Comment { }
